snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said that "dysfunction was legendary" in 2009 and 2010, when Democrats had a majority, and that Albany "cannot afford to go back to a period of dysfunction."
abstract: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said that "dysfunction was legendary" in 2009 and 2010, when Democrats had a majority, and that Albany "cannot afford to go back to a period of dysfunction."

headline.main: Cuomo Says 'Only Time Will Tell' if Senate Coalition Will Succeed
